fields.Description: The party crosses a group of bards, singing a song of rest. The party loses any debuffs.
fields.Name: Restful Bard Encounter

fields.Description: The party crosses a group of bards, singing a song of inspiration. 1D6 party members gain inspiration.
fields.Name: Heroic Bard Encounter

fields.Description: A party of five hunters are coming home from a hunt. One of them was slain by a great white beast. They will offer a 50gp reward for anyone who will slay the beast and bring proof to the nearby village.
fields.Name: Hunters Coming Home

fields.Description: A family of halflins is stranded on the side of the road. The axle of their cart is broken and they are unable to pursue their journey.
fields.Name: Broken Axle

fields.Description: An halflin named Allowin Townsen comes along asking for directions. He will attempt to pickpocket whoever he talks to from his money pouch or a small item of value (a 16 or higher passive Perception allows characters to discover his sleight of hand)
fields.Name: Pickpocket

fields.Description: A small shrine to Melora is found on the side of the road. If an offering is made, an small woodland animal will come to their aid in the next day of their journey.
fields.Name: Shrine to Melora

fields.Description: A strong storm picks up and forces the players to find shelter. They have to wait it out and lose one day of travel, or gain one point of exhaustion.
fields.Name: A Storm Brewing

fields.Description: A deep mist surrounds the characters. They must succeed a DC 16 Survival check or lose their current path.
fields.Name: Mist Rises

fields.Description: The party comes across a group of merchants willing to sell healing potions (30gp each), basic adventuring equipment), fresh meat, some herbs.
fields.Name: Traveling Merchant

fields.Description: Party members with 18+ perception catch the glimpse of a flying creature headed to the direction of the closest town
fields.Name: Flying Creature
